text: Ara yakhana manusa kastera sam'mukhina haya, suye base, damriye amake dakate thake. Tarapara ami yakhana ta theke mukta kare de'i, se kasta yakhana cale yaya takhana mane haya kakhano kona kastera'i sam'mukhina haye yena amake dake'ini. Emanibhabe manahputa hayeche nirbhaya lokadera ya tara kareche.
